name: David San Antonio
text: My sandwich was good and the service was friendly. I prefer subway if getting a sub because you can pick each individual ingredient as they put it on. But if you want a quick burger or something different D’Angelos has more options.

name: bumbo1987
text:
Avoid this place. Worst staff I have ever seen.
I just ordered large Lobster sandwich:
- bun was old and cold. Worst taste ever. I wouldn’t even give it to my dog.... …More

name: Lynn Kerkmann
text: I was beginning to think D'Angelo grill was not around anymore. Low and behold I found it in Merrimack NH! I have been craving a number 9 chz steak for months! Well, let me tell you I got one and it was fantastic! Bravo D'Angelo for your consistent amazing cheese steak! 2 thumbs up!

name: Gregory Dupree
text: Place was good ordered the Thanksgiving day sub and it was awesome.. the crew working there was way over welled and was awful took long time to get my stuff.. good food though

name: Timberly Matonic
text: This place has delicious sandwiches with fresh, fluffy bread.  The workers are friendly and the prices are close to Subway's but this is better food and service.  I love the tuna salad.

name: Ed Saige
text: Food was good, but it wasn't what we ordered. That's what you get for getting your order to go. Check your order before you leave the restaurant.

name: Dain Council
text: Every time i go in here i wait 30+ minutes for a sub and the employees are rude and discuss personal issues openly infront of customers. Clearly, management at this store is lacking severely. You could probably get a meal faster at the common man around the corner.

name: Amanda Costa
text: Freshest bread we have ever had at a D'Angelos. Staff was nice - did a great job on our sandwiches. It was also clean.

name: Logan kerney
text: 100% done with dangelos I ordered food and put in the apartment/suit section specifically where I worked and where to deliver it and called about 20 minutes after it was suppose to be delievered and they told me I can’t get my food because they aren’t delievering. Okay good to know, beyond pissed.

name: Justin B
text: Restaurant was not clean and staff were too busy talking to one another  then paying attention to the front counter. When I asked them for help to take my order they were extremely rude acting like I was both them. Once they did finally …More

name: JM
text: The fast food of subs is a dying breed. With Subway on the ropes, one might think this franchise would step up. I'm thinking this particular location isn't going to change. Just step inside, and you'll have a not so memorable trip back to …More

name: SKIP TRACER
text: Best Steak n Cheese you can get ANYWHERE in ManchVegas!

name: kerry mellen
text: I use to love it here. It was so nasty and expensive $50 for 4 subs 4 drinks . Subs where not even full, cheese not melted. Will NOT be back

name: Trevor Ballinger
text: Subs are amazing.... when they do actually deliver. I have ordered multiple times and at least 5-6 times in the last few monthes, they call and say they don’t have a delivery driver for today. Then I have to wait a week for my money to be returned back. Just a little annoying. Need to hire more staff.

name: Rotavirus
text: First time at this location. Service was good. Floor was dirty with food and debri. Bathroom was not impressive. No paper towels.  Kind of pricey for a chain sandwich shop. Had a medium ham/chz small fountain drink and chips = $10.45!!

name: Aleena Harney
text: What did you really expect? It's a chain sandwich shop. The number nine streak and cheese is really good. Don't get the rice bowls, barely any meat in them. Lobster rolls are wayyy over priced.

name: Emily Shmemsly
text: I always get there thanksgiving sandwich and love it every time.

name: Tim Cloutier
text: This place used to be great but they've really cut back on the quality and quantity.  This location at least still has good service but the chain as a whole isn't what it used to be.

name: Glenn Clark
text: Good good quick service fairly priced

name: Harry Barnes
text: Always a good place to go for a good sub

name: Catherine D
text: Pretty crappy experience tonight. Walked in and wasn't greeted by cook, basically her yelling at the girl to come ring. Ordered our food for toasted sandwiches and the girl brought it out, then wiped her hands off with a napkin that had …More

name: Jason Esquivel
text: First time at this chain. Wasn't impressed at all. Grilled steak sandwich came out no different than Subway. Warm meat, cold bread. But was more expensive and not as fast.

name: Kevin Harrington
text: Good food friendly staff

name: Don King
text: Good food and great service!

name: john thibodeaux
text: Good food, clean restaurant and nice staff.

name: Ian Hobson
text: Great food getting kinda pricey

name: Leah Rose
text: I dont know what happen but usually they're good but today my bread was stale dry my cheese wasn't melted enough it looks like they just slapped a cheese on the bread and no mayonnaise was on it

name: Don King
text: A good sandwich Everytime!

name: Dustin Rhodes
text: I love the Steak number 9

name: harley man
text: Poor service from the order taker. Did NOT get my order correct.

name: Steve Tambouris
text: Order got screwed up and took forever to get it to me

name: Josie Kramer
text: Very Pleasant Not Crowded

name: A Poutre
text: Amazing Lobster Rolls

name: Robert D, Marhefka
text: great food

name: Jennifer Schelly
text: Standard D'Angelos experience. Grilled sandwiches in sub rolls or pita pockets.

name: Matt Curran
text: Love the food here

name: Shaun Hickey
text: Love D'Angelos

name: Patrick Higley
text: Very light on substance in between the bread

name: Jim LaBrecque
text: Good food

name: Erik
text: Decent chain restaurant for sandwiches

name: vito romo
text: Good subs. Is not to prices.

name: Norman Lavoie
text: delivery sucks from here but ok food.

name: Mathieu Brisebois
text: (Translated by Google) Clean as a restaurant, seating is not spacious. Small table for a family. Very good sandwich, very tasty. A little more expensive than at Subway but so much better. Disappointed with not having had fresh coriander in …More
